hero.title: John David TCHOMGUI
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Full Stack Web Developer and Data Analyst passionate about transforming data into performant web solutions. Specialized in data analysis with Python, SQL and Power BI, and developing robust applications with React, Ruby on Rails, and Node.js. I combine technical expertise in frontend/backend development and analytical capabilities to create intuitive user interfaces and data-driven insights.
hero.description_continued: Trained at <lewagon>Le Wagon</lewagon> and <technofutur>Technofutur TIC</technofutur>, I am looking for new challenges combining web development and data analysis.

about.title: About
about.description1: Full Stack Web Developer and Data Analyst with dual technical expertise. Trained in web development at <lewagon>Le Wagon</lewagon> (Ruby on Rails, React, PostgreSQL) and data analysis at <technofutur>Technofutur TIC</technofutur> (Python, SQL, Power BI), I master the entire web application development cycle and complex data analysis.
about.description2: Passionate about digital transformation, I combine frontend/backend development and analytical skills to create performant web solutions enriched by data intelligence. Autonomous and collaborative, I excel both in teamwork and in conducting projects independently. My unconventional journey demonstrates great adaptability and continuous learning, essential for evolving in today's technology ecosystem.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: Creating responsive and intuitive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Angular, Vue.js and TypeScript. Mastery of Flexbox, Grid and Bootstrap for responsive designs.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.description: Development of robust and secure APIs with Ruby on Rails, Node.js, NestJS, Express and ASP.NET. JWT authentication management and REST API integration.

database.title: Databases & SQL
database.description: Expertise in PostgreSQL and SQL Server for database design, modeling and optimization. Mastery of SSMS (SQL Server Management Studio) for advanced management.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis & BI
dataAnalysis.description: Data analysis with Python (pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, seaborn), SQL and Power BI. Creating interactive dashboards, data cleaning, modeling and business intelligence visualization to transform data into strategic insights.

deployment.title: Deployment & DevOps
deployment.description: Application deployment on Heroku, domain management (Namecheap), server configuration and production deployment of full stack web applications independently.

agile.title: Agile Project Management
agile.description: Application of agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) with tools like Trello for task management, team collaboration and project progress tracking.

uxui.title: UX/UI Design
uxui.description: User-centered design and prototyping with Figma and Canva. Creating interactive mockups to validate user experience before development.

git.title: Git & Dev Tools
git.description: Mastery of Git/GitHub for versioning, Visual Studio Code, Postman for API testing, and collaborative workflow with branch management and pull requests.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio designed in React to showcase my projects, skills and journey, with a modern, responsive interface focused on user experience.

projects.title: LuxeDrive
projects.description: Full stack luxury car rental platform inspired by Airbnb. Secure authentication system, administration space, dynamic dashboard with sales visualization. Developed independently with Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap and Git versioning.

projects.title: CMCIEA-France
projects.description: Modern and responsive institutional website for the International Christian Missionary Community & Associated Churches France. Deployment on Heroku and domain name management via Namecheap.

projects.title: BMW Analysis - Data Warehouse
projects.description: Data Analysis Project: Design of a structured Data Warehouse to analyze BMW sales. Exploratory analysis with Python (pandas, matplotlib) to identify profitable models and trends by region. Interactive Power BI dashboards with customer-focused strategic recommendations.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Send me a message and I'll respond as soon as possible.

form.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

reviews.description: Very professional, thank you so much for the website. May the Lord's hand be even more upon your projects. Be abundantly blessed.
Thank you very much for your dynamism, I wish you to go further in your career.
I have seen this gentleman at work myself, very respectful and eloquent. Well done!
Thank you for your availability. Much courage to you. You are someone to recommend, hopefully your work will take you very far.
